Use the map features to draw as many polygons as you need to describe your knowlegde on *Rhea americana* distribution in the State of Rio Grande do Sul. 

Use the function **Draw a polygon** to start drawing.
Move the mouse over the RS map to see the name of the municipalities.               At least one polygon must be draw at this initial point.
